name: Ultimate Exterminator
description:
(EN) It's that time of year again, the Ultimate Exterminator Olympics has began and whoever causes the most destruction will be crowned the Ultimate Exterminator 2075. But don't worry the rules are simple; cause as much destruction as possible.

(PT-BR) É aquela época do ano de novo, as Olímpiadas do Exterminador Supremo começaram e aquele que causar a maior destruição será coroado o Exterminador Supremo de 2075. Mas não se preocupe, as regras são simples: cause a maior destruição que puder.

Instructions/Instruções:

WASD -> Camera Movement / Mover Câmera 

Mouse click -> Use Skill / Usar Habilidades 

1, 2, 3, 4 -> Select Skill / Escolher habilidade

Authors/Autores:

Abraão Filho e Thiago Melo

Assets used/usados:

LeanTween (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/animation/leantween-3595)

Viscera (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/utilities/viscera-68268)

CC-BY:

Hand Cursor by Simeon (FR) (https://thenounproject.com/search/?q=hand%20cursor&i=1298112)

Meteor by Michael G. Brown (https://thenounproject.com/search/?q=meteor&i=691195#)
